string.value: A little kid from #b#m260000000##k, #b#p2101001##k, has an older sister. Then why is #p2101001# standing by himself? You should ask him that.

#p2101001# has an older sister who used to tell him fun stories, but she was dragged into the castle by the guards one day. Concerned, #p2101001# wants you to tell his sister he misses her. \n\nWait, you forgot to ask him her name, though you have a hunch you'll recognize the #bsister of #p2101001##k when you see her.

Excuse me. Um, do you have access to the palace? See, the thing is, my sister's in there, and I was wondering if you could look for her for me.\r\n#L0# #b If your sister's in the palace, isn't that a good thing?#k

No way! My sister didn't want to go! The guards came and took her away...even though she said she didn't want to go... I think the queen took her after hearing that my sister's a good storyteller. If you...go into the palace, please just tell her I miss her.
Thank you so much. My sister knows a lot of stories. She also has a beautiful voice. The stories she told were so much fun to listen to... Please find her and tell her that #p2101001# misses her.
Youâ€¦you don't want to? I see... I'm sorry I asked for something that's so difficult to do.
Did you see my sister yet? She should be inside the palace.
